text: 3|72|haey muoy krom ampi aah li kitea b ban niyeay tha  chaur puok  anak chue tam avei delke ban banhchouh aoy banda anak mean chomnue(chomnean  mou ham meat) nowpel pruk  haey trauv bdeseth nowpel lngeach daembi  aoy anak teangnoh( anak mean chomnue) tralbtow rk sasanea robsa  puokke( aah li kitea b) .
